attributes.action: Have pubic holidays in aid of Plum sauce
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that a public holiday is created in aid of Plum sauce. Plum sauce has given our cuntry such joy over the years, and without it more ducks would be alive. Support my national holiday by signing my petition!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
